targets.expr: max(avg_over_time(nginx_ingress:namespace:request_rate{job="nginx-ingress-controller", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])) by (namespace)

max(quantile_over_time(0.9, nginx_ingress:namespace:request_rate{job="nginx-ingress-controller", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])) by (namespace)

max(max_over_time(nginx_ingress:namespace:traffic_bytes_rate{job="nginx-ingress-controller", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])) by (namespace) * 8
